name: Chief Dreams
description:
Godot Wild Jam 55 - Dreams Theme: Dreams

Keep your village Chief in a Dream state over 2 days(2 cycles of 3 phases) . Each Phase is 1 minute.

Day Phase: Keep villager penguins from bothering the Chief. Hit with stick!!!

Dream Phase:  Collect tail pods from shooting dragonfly tails. Don't hit the body! Spray the king with sleep dust from the tail.

Nightmare Phase: Use your FireStick to lure the Nightmare Spiders away from the Chief! Lure them towards campfires to destroy them!

Controls

1: Stick

2: TailSprayer

3: FireStick

W: Forward

S: Strafe Right

A: Strafe Left

D: Reverse

F: Use

L-Click: Swing Stick

L+R-Click: Aim and Shoot

Space: Jump
